Detailed Description

Static map entities and dynamic entities.

The file defines static map entities of type "entity" and dynamic entities of type "dynent" like players or monsters. The gamecode extends these types to add game specific functionality. Note that enties with the infix "Ent_" are the only static entity types dictated by the engine. The rest are gamecode dependent.
